lead_paragraph: The photographer Gaia Squarci documented the move by Steve Cannon, author of the novel “Groove, Bang and Jive Around,” from his Lower East Side artists’ hub.

headline.main: A Farewell to a Home for Art and Artists

snippet: The photographer Gaia Squarci documented the move by Steve Cannon, author of the novel “Groove, Bang and Jive Around,” from his Lower East Side artists’ hub.
abstract: Photographer Gaia Squarci, in 2011, documented final weeks of East Village poetry and arts space A Gathering of the Tribes, founded by writer Steve Cannon.
